com.datastax.oss.driver.api.mapper.annotations

Annotation Type Dao


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=CLASS)
public @interface Dao
    Annotates an interface that defines a set of query methods, usually (but not necessarily) related to a given entity class.

    Example: 

     @Dao
 public interface ProductDao {
   @Select
   Product findById(UUID productId);

   @Insert
   void save(Product product);

   @Delete
   void delete(Product product);
 }
    DAO instances are created via DaoFactory methods.

    DAO interfaces can define the following methods:

    • Delete
    • GetEntity
    • Insert
    • Query
    • Select
    • SetEntity
